};const handleForgotPasswordEmailChange=e=>{setForgotPasswordEmail(e.target.value);setError('');};const validateForm=()=>{if(!formData.username||!formData.password){setError('Please enter both email and password');return false;}const emailRegex=/^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/;if(!emailRegex.test(formData.username)){setError('Please enter a valid email address');return false;}return true;};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!validateForm()){return;}setLoading(true);setError('');setSuccess('');try{// Create form data for FastAPI Users login
